Sentencas: This study investigates the proper configuration of an electric propulsion system for a very large ethane carrier.
Titulo: Performance and availability of a marine generator-solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system in a very large ethane carrier

Sentencas: The system consists of a dual-fuel diesel electric generator and a solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system to replace the mechanical propulsion system based on a marine diesel engine.
Titulo: Performance and availability of a marine generator-solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system in a very large ethane carrier

Sentencas: When the ship navigates the open sea, the dual-fuel diesel electric generator and hybrid system run in parallel at a power rating of 16 MW.
Titulo: Performance and availability of a marine generator-solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system in a very large ethane carrier

Sentencas: However, the hybrid system only operates during the berthing state for ship hoteling.
Titulo: Performance and availability of a marine generator-solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system in a very large ethane carrier

Sentencas: The system efficiency, energy efficiency design index, and availability are considered to identify the optimal system configuration.
Titulo: Performance and availability of a marine generator-solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system in a very large ethane carrier

Sentencas: When the dual-fuel diesel electric generator produces 10 MW, the hybrid system generates 6 MW.
Titulo: Performance and availability of a marine generator-solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system in a very large ethane carrier

Sentencas: Because the electric propulsion system complies with international environmental regulations, it may be broadly acceptable for gas carriers in terms of eco-efficiency.
Titulo: Performance and availability of a marine generator-solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system in a very large ethane carrier

Sentencas: The system achieves high availability by using fault tree analysis and minimal cut sets.
Titulo: Performance and availability of a marine generator-solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system in a very large ethane carrier
